mapper.select:
SELECT COOPERATOR_ID, COOPERATOR_NM, REGISTRATION_SN, COMPANY_NM, REGISTRATION_NM, CEO_NM, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID, 'R' GUBUN FROM RD_COOPERATOR where 1= 1
AND REGISTRATION_SN = #{schIhidNum} and USE_AT ='Y'
and USE_AT ='Y'
UNION SELECT a.cooperator_id, '' COOPERATOR_NM, '' REGISTRATION_SN, '' COMPANY_NM, '' REGISTRATION_NM, '' CEO_NM, 'Y' USE_AT, '' CREAT_DT, '' CREAT_ID, 'T' GUBUN FROM RD_WEEK_INFO a LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR b ON a.cooperator_id =b.cooperator_id WHERE (b.cooperator_id IS NULL /*or IFNULL(b.use_at, 'N') ='N'*/) GROUP BY a.cooperator_id UNION SELECT a.cooperator_id, '' COOPERATOR_NM, '' REGISTRATION_SN, '' COMPANY_NM, '' REGISTRATION_NM, '' CEO_NM, 'Y' USE_AT, '' CREAT_DT, '' CREAT_ID, 'T' GUBUN FROM RD_DELIVERY_INFO a LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR b ON a.cooperator_id =b.cooperator_id WHERE (b.cooperator_id IS NULL /*or IFNULL(b.use_at, 'N') ='N'*/) GROUP BY a.cooperator_id

SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, COOPERATOR_NM, REGISTRATION_SN, COMPANY_NM, REGISTRATION_NM, CEO_NM, a.USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(b.CREAT_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS CREAT_DT, a.CREAT_ID, 'R' GUBUN , FEE_ID, FEE_ADMINSTRATOR, FEE_COOPERATOR, FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE, FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, FEE_TIME_INSURANCE, FEE_CALL, FEE_COOPERATOR_CALL, FEE_PROGRAM , sum(if(c.USE_AT='Y' AND (DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') <= c.END_DT OR c.END_DT IS null),1, 0)) RDCNT FROM RD_COOPERATOR a LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE b ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND b.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_RIDER_CONNECT c ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = c.COOPERATOR_ID AND c.USE_AT = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1
AND REGISTRATION_SN = #{schIhidNum} and a.USE_AT ='Y'
and a.USE_AT ='Y'
GROUP BY a.COOPERATOR_ID
UNION SELECT a.cooperator_id, '' COOPERATOR_NM, '' REGISTRATION_SN, '' COMPANY_NM, '' REGISTRATION_NM, '' CEO_NM, 'Y' USE_AT, '' CREAT_DT, '' CREAT_ID, 'T' GUBUN , '0' AS FEE_ID, '0' AS FEE_ADMINSTRATOR, '0' AS FEE_COOPERATOR, '0' AS FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, '0' AS FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE, '0' AS FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, '0' AS FEE_TIME_INSURANCE , '0' AS FEE_CALL, '0' AS FEE_COOPERATOR_CALL, '0' AS FEE_PROGRAM , sum(if(c.USE_AT='Y' AND (DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') <= c.END_DT OR c.END_DT IS null),1, 0)) RDCNT FROM RD_WEEK_INFO a LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR b ON a.cooperator_id =b.cooperator_id LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_RIDER_CONNECT c ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = c.COOPERATOR_ID AND c.USE_AT = 'Y' WHERE (b.cooperator_id IS NULL /*or IFNULL(b.use_at, 'N') ='N'*/) GROUP BY a.cooperator_id UNION SELECT a.cooperator_id, '' COOPERATOR_NM, '' REGISTRATION_SN, '' COMPANY_NM, '' REGISTRATION_NM, '' CEO_NM, 'Y' USE_AT, '' CREAT_DT, '' CREAT_ID, 'T' GUBUN , '0' AS FEE_ID, '0' AS FEE_ADMINSTRATOR, '0' AS FEE_COOPERATOR, '0' AS FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, '0' AS FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE, '0' AS FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, '0' AS FEE_TIME_INSURANCE , '0' AS FEE_CALL, '0' AS FEE_COOPERATOR_CALL, '0' AS FEE_PROGRAM , sum(if(c.USE_AT='Y' AND (DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') <= c.END_DT OR c.END_DT IS null),1, 0)) RDCNT FROM RD_DELIVERY_INFO a LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR b ON a.cooperator_id =b.cooperator_id LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_RIDER_CONNECT c ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = c.COOPERATOR_ID AND c.USE_AT = 'Y' WHERE (b.cooperator_id IS NULL /*or IFNULL(b.use_at, 'N') ='N'*/) GROUP BY a.cooperator_id

SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, COOPERATOR_NM, REGISTRATION_SN, COMPANY_NM, REGISTRATION_NM, CEO_NM, a.USE_AT, a.CREAT_DT, a.CREAT_ID, 'R' GUBUN , sum(if(b.USE_AT='Y' AND (DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') <= b.END_DT OR b.END_DT IS null),1, 0)) RDCNT FROM RD_COOPERATOR a LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_RIDER_CONNECT b ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND b.USE_AT = 'Y' where 1= 1
AND REGISTRATION_SN = #{schIhidNum} and a.USE_AT ='Y'
and a.USE_AT ='Y'
GROUP BY a.COOPERATOR_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RD_COOPERATOR (COOPERATOR_ID,COOPERATOR_NM, REGISTRATION_SN, COMPANY_NM, REGISTRATION_NM, CEO_NM, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES (#{cooperatorId},#{cooperatorNm}, REGEXP_REPLACE(#{registrationSn}, '[^0-9]+', ''), #{companyNm}, #{registrationNm}, #{ceoNm}, #{useAt},SYSDATE(),#{creatId})

/*merge를 쓰면 아이디와 삭제(실제로는 빈데이터)만 있는데도 저장이 되는 문제가 있어 select => insert or update로 바꾸자*/ INSERT INTO RD_COOPERATOR (COOPERATOR_ID,COOPERATOR_NM, REGISTRATION_SN, COMPANY_NM, REGISTRATION_NM, CEO_NM, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES (#{cooperatorId},#{cooperatorNm}, REGEXP_REPLACE(#{registrationSn}, '[^0-9]+', ''), #{companyNm}, #{registrationNm}, #{ceoNm}, #{useAt},SYSDATE(),#{creatId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE COOPERATOR_ID = VALUES(COOPERATOR_ID), COOPERATOR_NM = VALUES(COOPERATOR_NM), REGISTRATION_SN = VALUES(REGISTRATION_SN), COMPANY_NM = VALUES(COMPANY_NM), REGISTRATION_NM = VALUES(REGISTRATION_NM), CEO_NM = VALUES(CEO_NM), USE_AT = #{useAt}, last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE(), last_updusr_id = VALUES(CREAT_ID)
INSERT INTO RD_COOPERATOR_USR (COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID, USE_AT , CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES (#{cooperatorId},#{mberId}, #{useAt}, SYSDATE(), #{creatId})

/*merge를 쓰면 아이디와 삭제만 있는데도 저장이 되는 문제가 있어 select => insert or update로 바꾸자*/ INSERT INTO RD_COOPERATOR_USR (COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES (#{cooperatorId}, #{mberId}, #{useAt},SYSDATE(),#{creatId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE COOPERATOR_ID = VALUES(COOPERATOR_ID), MBER_ID = VALUES(MBER_ID), USE_AT = #{useAt}, last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE(), last_updusr_id = VALUES(CREAT_ID)
mapper.select: SELECT a.cooperator_id, a.mber_id, a.use_at, b.USER_NM, b.mbtlnum FROM RD_COOPERATOR_USR a left join COMTNEMPLYRINFO b ON a.mber_id = b.EMPLYR_ID WHERE a.use_at = 'Y' AND cooperator_id = #{cooperatorId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO RD_COOPERATOR_RIDER_CONNECT (CON_ID/*, UP_CON_ID*/,COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID, REG_DT, END_DT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES (#{conId},#{cooperatorId}, #{mberId},
DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d'),
null,
#{endDt}, SYSDATE(), #{creatId})
mapper.select:
SELECT a.EMPLYR_ID as mber_id, a.USER_NM, a.mbtlnum, a.ihidnum, a.EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE from COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT JOIN COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS b ON a.ESNTL_ID = b.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID WHERE 1=1 /* AND a.EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE = 'P' /*P:사용 D:미사용*/ AND b.AUTHOR_CODE ='ROLE_USER'
AND a.IHIDNUM = #{schIhidNum}

SELECT c.COOPERATOR_ID, c.COOPERATOR_NM, c.REGISTRATION_SN, c.COMPANY_NM, c.REGISTRATION_NM, c.CEO_NM, c.USE_AT, c.CREAT_DT, c.CREAT_ID from COMTNEMPLYRINFO a JOIN COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS b ON a.ESNTL_ID = b.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID JOIN RD_COOPERATOR c ON a.IHIDNUM = c.REGISTRATION_SN WHERE 1=1 AND a.EMPLYR_ID = #{mberId}

SELECT c.COOPERATOR_ID, c.COOPERATOR_NM, c.REGISTRATION_SN, c.COMPANY_NM, c.REGISTRATION_NM, c.CEO_NM, c.USE_AT, c.CREAT_DT, c.CREAT_ID from COMTNEMPLYRINFO a JOIN COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS b ON a.ESNTL_ID = b.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID JOIN RD_COOPERATOR c ON a.IHIDNUM = c.REGISTRATION_SN WHERE 1=1 AND a.EMPLYR_ID = #{mberId} AND COOPERATOR_ID = #{cooperatorId} AND use_at = 'Y'
SELECT MBER_ID AS mberId , MBER_NM AS mberNm , MBTLNUM AS mbtlnum , ESNTL_ID AS uniqId , MBER_CONFIRM_AT AS mberConfirmAt FROM COMTNGNRLMBER WHERE MBER_ID = #{mberId}
SELECT EMPLYR_ID AS mberId , USER_NM AS mberNm , MBTLNUM AS mbtlnum , ESNTL_ID AS uniqId , MBER_CONFIRM_AT AS mberConfirmAt FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #{mberId}

SELECT FEE_ID, COOPERATOR_ID , FEE_ADMINSTRATOR, FEE_COOPERATOR, FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE , FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, FEE_TIME_INSURANCE, FEE_CALL, FEE_COOPERATOR_CALL, FEE_PROGRAM , USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR_FEE WHERE COOPERATOR_ID = #{cooperatorId}
/* 협력사 조건 */ AND COOPERATOR_ID IN ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR a WHERE a.REGISTRATION_SN = #{schIhidNum} AND use_at ='Y' )

SELECT FEE_ID, COOPERATOR_ID , FEE_ADMINSTRATOR, FEE_COOPERATOR, FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE , FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, FEE_TIME_INSURANCE, FEE_CALL, FEE_COOPERATOR_CALL, FEE_PROGRAM, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR_FEE WHERE FEE_ID = #{feeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE RD_COOPERATOR_FEE SET USE_AT = 'N' , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate() , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE COOPERATOR_ID = #{cooperatorId} and USE_AT = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT CON_ID/*, UP_CON_ID*/,COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR_RIDER_CONNECT WHERE mber_id = #{mberId} AND cooperator_id = #{cooperatorId} and use_at ='Y'
SELECT * FROM RD_COOPERATOR_RIDER_CONNECT WHERE mber_id = #{mberId} AND cooperator_id = #{cooperatorId} AND use_at ='Y'

SELECT COOPERATOR_ID, COOPERATOR_NM,REGISTRATION_SN,REGISTRATION_NM,RUN_DE,DELIVERY_SN,DELIVERY_STATE, SERVICE_TYPE,DELIVERY_TYPE,RIDER_ID,MBER_ID,RIDER_NM,DELIVERY_METHOD,SHOP_SN,SHOP_NM,GOODS_PRICE, PICKUP_ADDR,DESTINATION_ADDR,ORDER_DT,OPERATE_RIDER_DT,SHOP_COMEIN_DT,PICKUP_FINIST_DT,DELIVERY_FINIST_DT, DISTANCE,ADD_DELIVERY_REASON,ADD_DELIVERY_DESC,PICKUP_LAW_DONG,BASIC_PRICE,WEATHER_PRIMAGE,ADD_PRIMAGE, PEAK_PRIMAGE_ETC,DELIVERY_PRICE,RIDER_CAUSE_YN,ADD_PRIMAGE_DESC,NOTE,ATCH_FILE_ID,CREAT_DT,CREAT_ID FROM RD_DELIVERY_INFO WHERE MBER_ID = #{mberId} ORDER BY CREAT_DT DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT COUNT(ETC_ID) TOTAL_CNT FROM RD_ETC WHERE COOPERATOR_ID = #{cooperatorId} AND MBER_ID = #{mberId}
AND use_at ='Y' AND auth_request_dt IS NOT NULL AND auth_respons_dt IS NULL /*요청했으나 승인을 않한건*/
mapper.update: UPDATE RD_ETC SET AUTH_REQUEST_DT = SYSDATE() , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = #{lastUpdtPnttm}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = SYSDATE() WHERE ETC_ID = #{etcId} AND RESPONS_AT !='Y' AND USE_AT = 'Y'
UPDATE RD_ETC SET USE_AT = 'N' , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = #{lastUpdtPnttm}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = SYSDATE() WHERE ETC_ID = #{etcId} AND RESPONS_AT !='Y' AND USE_AT = 'Y'
UPDATE RD_ETC SET AUTH_RESPONS_DT = SYSDATE(), RESPONS_AT = 'Y' , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = #{lastUpdtPnttm}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = SYSDATE() WHERE ETC_ID = #{etcId} and MBER_ID = #{mberId}
